'''绝地'''是中国玄幻小说改编的动画《[[全职法师]]》第三季的片尾曲。

== 简介 ==
阅文集团出品动画《[[全职法师]]》第三季的片尾曲。

==衍生版本==
《绝地_Full Size》、《绝地_TV Size》  

== MV ==
{{BilibiliVideo|id=33847724}}
{{music163|1321442725}}

== 歌词 ==
<poem>
{{color|blue|Until we start to fight keep alive
No matter what they said you must believe in yourself
You will breaking through the night
Fire in your eyes shining so bright

每一次 孤单的旅行
轮回新的谜题
逃不出命运 怀疑
是谁拨动了这一赛季的天平
难道不曾尝过绝望一击
就不够资历
来背水搏一局
不再逃避
踏上未知的禁区
打破了沉默的规矩
越背道而行 越不再犹豫
跟随着我的心
等风起 展翅翱翔去 遇见你}}

One time you fight the fear fly to high
Every drop of sweat remembers how you have tried
You are born to be the one
Who realize all desires
Until we start to fight keep alive
No matter what they said you must believe in yourself
You will breaking through the night
Fire in your eyes shining so bright

再一次 仰望这星海
最初的梦还在
决心去为你 征战
启程的路上夜空比灯火灿烂
躲在此刻悲泣过去的人
没资格挑战
坚定才能 勇敢
热血不散
再一同搏击未来
七子连星 一举成败
不被谁称赞 才最不平凡
只有我能主宰
再一战 全力以赴不留遗憾

One time you fight the fear fly to high
Every drop of sweat remembers how you have tried
You are born to be the one
Who realize all desires
Until we start to fight keep alive
No matter what they said you must believe in yourself
You will breaking through the night
Fire in your eyes shining so bright

越黑暗越接近光明
挣扎过才幸运
绝地才有新生机
时间总会带给你惊喜
与你肩并肩 共御强敌
无所畏惧

{{color|blue|One time you fight the fear fly to high
Every drop of sweat remembers how you have tried
You are born to be the one
Who realize all desires
Until we start to fight keep alive
No matter what they said you must believe in yourself
You will breaking through the night
Fire in your eyes shining so bright
Oh
You're always standing by my side}}
</poem>
{{color|red|注意！歌词蓝色字体部分为 《绝地_TV Size》版歌词}}
